Title: The King, the Widow and Rick
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (based on the series of graphic novels by), Tony Moore (based on the series of graphic novels by), Charlie Adlard (based on the series of graphic novels by), Angela Kang, Corey Reed
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Lauren Cohan, Chandler Riggs
Plot: With things looking up for Rick and the group, an argument breaks out at the Hilltop, where the consequences of the decision are life versus death.
